summary: This module walks a CloudFormation resource graph to evaluate and replace template variables, intrinsic functions, conditions, mappings, and pseudo‑parameters, producing concrete values for each graph vertex. It also supplies a vertex reference wrapper that translates CloudFormation block type identifiers into the internal BlockType enumeration.
business_intent: Facilitate precise static analysis and security scanning of CloudFormation templates by fully resolving dynamic template constructs into concrete values before evaluation.
